about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about STD5
about.description: Founded in Istanbul in 2017, STD provides post-production services at the highest standards in 3 different locations today. With its experienced staff and technological facilities in its studios, it creatively creates editing, sound design, color, dubbing, and visual effects for films, series, and commercials and prepares them for broadcast. Having completed more than 250 projects since its establishment, it has become Turkey's largest Post Production studio.
